short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free Windows Style Minesweeper game taken to a whole new level. The loved strategy game we all love in a renewed version.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Classic Minesweeper game is now available for free as a new tab chrome extension. as part of MineBlown - Online Minesweeper Project. Please leave feedback in reviews so we can improve!
